name: Declan Griffin
description: Declan Griffin, better known asthe Brickor simplyBrick, is a character featured inCyberpunk 2077. Brick was the leader of theMaelstromgang inNight City. In2077, Brick established contact withMilitechemployeeAnthony Gilchristusing fellow gang memberOfelia "Patricia" Sirawianas messenger.Gilchrist started to secretly collaborate with Maelstrom to provide them with details about Militech convoys in order to steal the shipments and get a cut of the profits after selling the goods.Brick then made a deal withfixerDexter DeShawn, who purchased aMilitech MT0D12 "Flathead"forâ‚¬$10,000 that the gang had...
